name: Racing Team Knife Garage Game: The Race across your finger - Free Edition
name_original: Racing Team Knife Garage Game: The Race across your finger - Free Edition
description:
FINGER CRASH GAME WITH GARAGE TOOLS !

Most amazing knife game is here. This game is between drivers and mechanics who love to play finger crash game in the garage.

Spread your fingers and make all tools such as wrench, pliers and screwdriver dancing between your fingers. Start this game slow and calm to play this game safely.

How to play?

- Spread your fingers and make garage instrument dancing between your fingers
- Don’t hurt your fingers
- Loaded with hard round

Download RACING TEAM KNIFE GARAGE GAME for FREE
